title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Lead data science initiatives using Python, machine learning, TensorFlow, and deep learning. Strong communication skills and teamwork required. Experience with SQL, data visualization, and statistical analysis.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build scalable web applications using React, Node.js, JavaScript, MongoDB. Knowledge of AWS, Docker, CI/CD pipelines. Problem-solving and collaboration essential.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop ML models using PyTorch, scikit-learn, NLP techniques. Experience with cloud platforms (Azure/GCP), data preprocessing, feature engineering required.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage infrastructure using Kubernetes, Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible. Strong Linux administration, scripting (Bash/Python), monitoring (Prometheus) skills needed.

title: Backend Developer
description: Design RESTful APIs using Java, Spring Boot, microservices architecture. PostgreSQL, Redis, message queues (Kafka/RabbitMQ) experience. Attention to detail critical.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data using Excel, Tableau, Power BI. SQL proficiency, statistical knowledge, data storytelling abilities required. Adaptability and curiosity valued.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Create responsive interfaces with React, TypeScript, HTML/CSS, Redux. Figma collaboration, accessibility standards, creative thinking essential.

title: Python Developer
description: Develop automation scripts and data pipelines using Python, Pandas, FastAPI. Experience with web scraping, ETL processes, Git version control.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design cloud infrastructure on AWS/Azure with security best practices. Networking, IAM, cost optimization, strategic thinking capabilities needed.

title: Business Intelligence Developer
description: Build dashboards and reports using Tableau, Power BI, SQL Server. Data modeling, ETL development, stakeholder management skills required.

title: AI Research Scientist
description: Research computer vision, NLP, reinforcement learning using TensorFlow, PyTorch. Strong mathematics, research methodology, academic writing needed.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Perform manual and automated testing using Selenium, JUnit, TestNG. API testing (Postman), performance testing, analytical mindset essential.

title: Product Manager
description: Define product roadmap, gather requirements, collaborate with engineering teams. Leadership, strategic thinking, user empathy critical.

title: Data Engineer
description: Build data pipelines using Apache Spark, Airflow, Python, Hadoop. SQL optimization, data warehousing (Snowflake/Redshift) experience needed.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop iOS/Android apps using React Native, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin. RESTful API integration, UI/UX sensitivity, time management skills.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor security threats, conduct vulnerability assessments, implement security controls. Ethical hacking, incident response, attention to detail required.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Develop smart contracts using Solidity, Web3.js, Ethereum. Cryptography knowledge, problem-solving, innovation mindset essential.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces using Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch. User research, prototyping, empathy, creativity, collaboration abilities needed.

title: Network Engineer
description: Manage network infrastructure including routers, switches, firewalls. Cisco certifications, troubleshooting, communication skills required.

title: Salesforce Developer
description: Customize Salesforce platform using Apex, Visualforce, Lightning components. Integration experience (REST APIs), client interaction skills.

title: IoT Engineer
description: Develop IoT solutions using Arduino, Raspberry Pi, MQTT, Python. Embedded systems, sensor integration, innovation required.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description: Ensure system reliability using monitoring tools, automation, incident management. Linux, scripting, on-call responsibility, resilience needed.

title: Game Developer
description: Create games using Unity, C#, Unreal Engine. 3D modeling basics, gameplay mechanics, passion for gaming essential.

title: Scrum Master
description: Facilitate agile ceremonies, remove blockers, coach teams. Scrum certification, servant leadership, conflict resolution skills.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create technical documentation, API guides, user manuals. Writing skills, technical aptitude, attention to detail required.

title: ETL Developer
description: Design ETL processes using Informatica, SSIS, SQL. Data transformation, scheduling, troubleshooting abilities needed.

title: SAP Consultant
description: Implement SAP modules (FICO/MM/SD), configure systems, train users. Business process knowledge, client management essential.

title: Robotics Engineer
description: Design robotic systems using ROS, Python, computer vision. Mechanical knowledge, programming, innovation mindset required.

title: Content Strategist
description: Plan content strategy, SEO optimization, analytics tracking. Creativity, data-driven thinking, communication skills needed.

title: Systems Administrator
description: Manage servers, Active Directory, backup systems, security patches. Windows/Linux administration, troubleshooting, reliability essential.
